attributes.action: Create a COMPLETE ban on smoking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am completely against any type of Tobacco smoking. I petition you, Prime Minister, to gently remove smoking. I would do this in 4 steps: 
1. Smoking prices go up
2. You can NOT sell cigarettes within a 1 mile radius of schools
3. More warnings going out and an anti-smoking advert every hour.
4. Complete ban.
This would benefit everyone, as it prevents passive smoking, will reduce the chances of catching Lung Cancer, etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
